extendedInfo.description: Club Paparazzi free is a very fun augmented reality game!You are going ot be faced a great challange to make a good photos and catch model girls while they are in vacation.Take your best shoots and make original photos, trying to catch the girls on camera.The girls appears as augmented objects in your phone/tablet camera. While move the phone/tablet, try to place girl in best position in camera lens and tap anywhere on screen to make the photo.After each level, your best photo will be using as cover of lifestyle magazine and make you famouse.Each Level has a timeout to complete, so keep watching level time and make desicion to take a goog photo or fail the level!HOW TO PLAY1. Wait until the sexy girl appears, move your phone to catch the girl in the camera lens and tap anywhere on the screen to make a photo.2.Keep away from the bodyguard! Do not take a photo on them. The Bodyguard will bust you and the level will fail!3. After game end you may review your photos and share them with your friends.Club Paparazzi free game supports Scoreloop and you can review your rating and make a challange to someone in competition.Make your best shoots!Try you best photographer's skill, make more points and compete with your friends in leader board!If you enjoy Club Paparazzi free: The Shooter Man, you may also enjoy our exciting shooting game!The Diver Man, you may also enjoy our extreame action diving game!Support our efforts to make more exciting games by rating us on market!

reviews.title: Suck game
reviews.comment: Wtf it suddenly stop working. I cant do any thing when it is stopping i had to shut down. Guys dont play this suck game trust me or u will be in great trouble
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutley hate it
reviews.comment: This app is terrible i hate it do not install waste of time!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: This \"game\" doesn\'t have anything to do with af, plus there\'s no game in it at all, looking at screen and pasting 2 sprites on it that move at random is no game.
reviews.author: Kre\305\241imir Horvat
